overview: Gisa has a hair full of life and spirit, but her classmates keep annoying her because of it. Sad and with low self esteem, she decide to look for Bruxa Lereira (Witchstylist), who changes her in someone that she's not and, because of it, Gisa almost lost the chance of meeting her mother again, the Queen Andrea. In this tale that blend reality with fantasy, told through inks and fabrics, Grandma Ita involves her granddaughter Gisele, showing her that beauty is in everybody, also, on her and in her identity.
title: Fábula de Vó Ita
